ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to check that person account name is not updated -TKT-000351 : amended rule to allow pnet (Partner Connection User) and cimpo (CDW Import) for SF2SF sync from CRM4U
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $User.Alias != 'pnet', $User.Alias != 'paas', $Profile.Name != 'CDW Data Import', $Profile.Name != 'Reltio Integration', ( ISCHANGED(FirstName) || ISCHANGED( LastName ) || ISCHANGED( Salutation ) || ISCHANGED( MiddleName ) || ISCHANGED( Suffix ) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HCP_RMI' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please forward change requests to RFM Systems Admin.
